Analysis

Here you will find my poker analysis. From hands I fuc%$ed up to strategies I am attempting to implement, this is the place where I try to clearly convey something of value and use to those on a similar mountain.

View all analysis sorted by post date below or select a specific tag to sort by method of analysis. I have also reposted or linked to resources that I found valuable. Work that is not my own is cited.
